name: Extract key info from document via ComPDF AI MCP and upload results as JSON to Google Drive
description:
Automatically download an unstructured document from Google Drive using its file ID, extract key information such as names, dates, amounts, and entities through ComPDF AI MCP, and convert it into structured JSON data stored back in your Google Drive folder.

This template transforms unstructured content into machine-readable data, helping you automate information extraction, classification, and downstream analysis â€” ideal for reports, contracts, invoices, and other text-heavy documents.

Before you start:
Ensure Google Drive and ComPDF AI MCP connections are properly configured.
Prepare a valid Google file ID and folder access permission.
If your workflow requires specific fields, define them in advance to map extraction results correctly.
